data.name: Warface – Headstart Pack
data.detailed_description:
This package contains the following items:


  • IMBEL IA2 + Tigerstripe camo

  • Mateba Autorevolver + Tigerstripe camo

  • Jagdkommando + Tigerstripe camo

Headstart Pack provides powerful weapons that come with famous Tigerstripe camo. These weapons can serve as a serious boost to both beginners and veterans alike. Weapon collectors will appreciate the vibrant and realistic colors applied to these universal tools of war.

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Assault rifle – IMBEL IA2. IA2 assault rifle was designed for the special Armed Forces to replace the previous model. This IMBEL has a long list of pros: high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

Pistol – Mateba Autorevolver. Mateba Model 6 Unica revolver (also known as Mateba Autorevolver) is a representative of a rare type of automatic revolver. Developed and produced in Italy.

Melee – Jagdkommando Knife. Jagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel. Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
